title: ALCHEMY: An AI Architecture Render Competition !
subtitle: RESULTS ARE IN !!!
author: Micronation
htmlContent:
üß™ ALCHEMY: An AI Architecture Render Competition

Organized by Micronation ‚Äì a global community fostering architectural innovation and excellence.

üèõÔ∏è Challenge Overview

Theme: Reimagining History

Participants are invited to select a historical monument‚Äîsuch as a castle, palace, or temple‚Äîand envision a new, contemporary use for it in the 21st century. The goal is to integrate modern functionality while preserving the monument's historical and architectural essence.

üéØ Objectives

  • Revitalization: Adapt landmarks for modern relevance.
  • Sustainability: Ensure long-term preservation of cultural heritage.
  • Social Impact: Encourage community participation.
  • Innovation: Blend historic character with contemporary design.

üß† Key Considerations

  • Monument Selection: Pick an adaptable structure.
  • New Functionality: Define a modern use (e.g., museum, co-working space).
  • Architectural Integration: Harmonize old and new design elements.
  • Sustainability: Use eco-conscious practices.
  • Accessibility: Make the space inclusive and user-friendly.

üì¶ Submission Requirements

  1. Project Title: Name your concept.
  2. High-Resolution AI Render: Visualize your transformed monument.
  3. Description (250 words): Explain the new use and integration with original architecture.

üì• Download the template from: Google Drive Link

üèÜ Evaluation Criteria

  • Creativity & Functionality: Originality of concept.
  • Respectful Integration: Maintain architectural integrity.
  • Visual Impact: Rendering quality and storytelling.

üéÅ Prizes

  • Winner: ‚Çπ15,000 + Certificate + Social media + Website feature
  • 1st Runner-Up: ‚Çπ7,500 + Certificate + Social media + Website feature

üîó Official Info: micronation.co.in

title: SQRATCH Competition

description: Join the SQRATCH Competition to demonstrate your expertise and creativity within the SQRATCH ecosystem.

htmlContent:
SQRATCH Competition

Organized by Micronation ‚Äì a global community fostering innovation and excellence.

üèÜ Competition Overview
